item.title: My wife is 9 years older than I am — but makes 50% less. Will I have to retire for her to receive my Social Security spousal benefits?
item.description: “She will probably retire nearly a decade before I do.”

item.title: What Okta’s failures say about the future of identity security in 2025
item.description: 2025 needs to be the year identity providers go all in on improving every aspect of software quality and security, including red teaming.

item.title: I was invited to join a VIP investment club. It promoted bitcoin and other crypto — that’s when the trouble started.
item.description: “The people in charge, I realize now, somehow managed to manipulate a small-cap stock so the members made profits.”

item.title: Reforged Labs launches AI ad-creation service for mobile games in open beta
item.description: Reforged Labs announced today that it's launching its AI-based ad-creation service, built specifically for mobile game studios, in open beta.

item.title: Our brains are vector databases — here’s why that’s helpful when using AI
item.description: Parallels between our brains and vector databases go deeper than retrieval. Both excel at compression, organizing and identifying patterns.
